attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
His subversion of the moral character of the nation constitutes a threat to the state. In a similar fashion to Abu Hamza, his discourse and commentary incite hatred and encourages eco- terrorism. In the interests of safety, he should be deported with immediate effect and his passport revoked.

Yours, the undersigned.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
